name: Times^2 Demo
description:
An action kinda-puzzle-but-not-really game where you can only move 90 degrees at a time. Rotate your way through difficult tests of timing, speed and thinking.

Use down and up to move your swivel point clockwise and anti-clockwise. Use right and left to rotate clockwise and anti-clockwise. The objective is to reach the end of the stage. Currently there are three playable levels.

WASD, arrow keys and controllers can be used. Mobile is supported with swipe controls, but is currently far less than ideal; playing on desktop is extremely recommended.

Any and all feedback, suggestions, criticisms and bug reports are welcome.

Enjoy!
